Name: Merry Fitness
LongDescription:
🌟 🎄 Merry Fitness 🎄 🌟

We exercise and help animals 🤎
Lets meet together on Christmas edition of fitness classes ☃️during which we raise funds for the Dog Shelter in Nowa Dęba 🐱🐶

When?
🗓️ December 16, 7:00 PM - 8:30 PM

Where?
📍Local Government Cultural Center in Nowa Dęba
Don't miss this opportunity to combine business with pleasure 💪
Grab a mat, some water and join me! 🔥

Free admission - charity collection 🧡
...at the end special gifts for all participants 🎁🤭

Name: Women's Power
LongDescription:
🌟 Women's Power — Meeting with an Inspiring Woman! 🌟

Did you know that our speaker is not only a civil engineer with international experience, but also a karate champion and IT specialist? 🤯

Want to learn more fascinating facts about her life and passions? Join us at the next meeting in the Women's Power series!

Don't miss this opportunity to be inspired by a story full of passion and determination! 💪✨

Ladies and Gentlemen, we invite all of you, this meeting is for everyone! 🙌
